mapper.insert: insert into manage (did, manager_wid) select #{manager.did}, #{manager.managerWid} from dual where (#{manager.did} in (select department.did from department)) and (#{manager.managerWid} in (select worker.wid from worker)) and (#{manager.did} in (select worker.did from worker where worker.wid=#{manager.managerWid}))
mapper.update: update manage set manager_wid = #{manager.manager_wid} where did = #{manager.did} and #{manager.managerWid} in (select worker.wid from worker) and #{manager.managerWid} in (select worker.did from worker where worker.wid = #{manager.managerWid})
mapper.select: select did, manager_wid from manage order by did
select count(*) from (select manager_wid from manage) as md
